General Description：

·         As China is the growing market for passenger cars, Mercedes-Benz MBUX Voice interaction (SDS) team is looking for an experienced expert who shares the same passion and enthusiasm for driving our China voice interaction system development creating outstanding user experiences in our cars. Our mission is to provide the best customer fitting user journey experience by taking the speech interaction as the main and most natural interaction modality in order to spoil our customers with convenience, luxury and surprises.

·         The MBUX Voice Interaction team is looking for a skilled data technology expert to join our team. The ideal candidate has an eye for building hybrid based data analysis system and foundation. Responsible for building, operating and optimizing data analysis platform and work closely with our systems architects and data engineers to deliver data system products and ensure consistency of data delivery and utilization across multiple projects.

·         As Data Expert, you use your knowledge to create real impact on possibly millions of voice interaction on Mercedes vehicle. Let them more and more enjoy the life with MBUX voice assistant.

·         You will be an important member for our Data Driven Development strategy, responsible for advocating for the adoption of data mesh architecture and promoting the use of our data platform.

·         You will deal with the following tasks:

Job Description：

·         Perform data cleansing, aggregation, analysis and visualization from large and varied data sources to build a data driven understanding of MBUX voice assistant

·         Analyze data to figure out trends, and output reports with clear recommendations.

·         Support the team for field issue analysis with data analyzing incl. customer behavior analysis.

·         Create/Update visualization dashboard/data analysis tool

·         Regularly make the data report.

·         Contribute to building and maintaining the data catalogue, documentation and best practices sharing.

·         Exchange with data expert in RD Germany regarding to data methodology

·         Actively participating and sharing knowledge with colleagues.

Task：

·         Design and develop data platforms that adhere to data mesh principles.

·         Working directly with the team to build strong hybrid-based data collection systems. Responsible for infrastructure management, IT security and performance tuning.

·         Operate on Cloud infrastructure to select different Paas, Saas services to orchestrate a flexible dynamic data processing architecture.

·         Develop and maintain Dashboard and reporting tooling.

·         Educate stakeholders on the benefits of data mesh and provide guidance on its implementation.

·         Innovate and develop new data solutions to drive the company's technological advancement

Qualifications：

·         Bachelor / Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Statistics, Data Science, STEM or with a related technical field

·         3+ Experience in development, implementations, design, and analysis of big data

·         Experience in processing large, multi-dimensional datasets from different sources and automating the pipeline

·         Experience in data modeling and data warehousing

·         Experience in architecture and usage of cloud services (Azure, AWS, Alibaba Cloud)

·         Practical experience in Data Science/Data Engineering or Machine Learning

·         Experience in designing and developing data platforms.

·         Strong programming skills in languages such as Python or Java.

·         Experience with SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Neo4j, CouchDB, etc.)

·         Familiarity with at least one data visualization tool (Tableau or Power BI preferred).

·         Ability to work independently in an unstructured environment and to manage own projects.

·         Chinese native speaker with fluent English language skills, speak German is preferred.

·         Intercultural competence and communication skills with various hierarchy levels

·         Self-responsible working attitude and initiative

·         You combine creative and analytical skills to develop innovative solutions and find efficient answers to tough challenges

·         You love to keep the customer in mind when diving through data as a constant compass for your quality mindset.

·         As a Data Scientist you communicate technical topics and analysis results clearly and effectively to influence the business and decisions.
